name: Guard of Wonderland
description: Guard of Wonderland is a visual novel created from our inspirations of "Alice in Wonderland"; a tribute of respect and love for the author's talent. Here is the atmosphere of absurdity and, at the same time, the beauty of the world in the book, but with new characters and an unconventional look at the story of Wonderland.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: Intel Core i5 i5-3470 3.20 GHz Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 675MX Место на диске: 2 GB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 10 Процессор: Intel Core i5 i5-3470 3.20 GHz Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 660 Место на диске: 2 GB
